com.marklogic.semantics.rdf4j - package com.marklogic.semantics.rdf4j
Contains core classes for instantiating a MarkLogic backed RDF4J Repository (MarkLogicRepository) and connection (MarkLogicRepositoryConnection), including exceptions.
com.marklogic.semantics.rdf4j.client - package com.marklogic.semantics.rdf4j.client
Contains classes that abstract the connection to MarkLogic Java Client API and attendant result and write caches.
